abriz Rinzyn Kho was a priest of the Spinner of Shadows in the world of Eberron.
Sabriz had gray skin and white hair tied back. She wore an elaborate mask and a cultist outfit that exposed most of her body, and wielded a spiked mace.
Sabriz could call on a number of powerful spells, including mass inflict critical wounds, firestorm, cometfall, and unholy blight.
During the Darkening of Faer√ªn, Sabriz served as a leader in the Lords of Dust cult dedicated to the demonic being known as the Spinner of Shadows. As part of a great plot to free their patron, fellow member Karas fueled a ritual with his life and blasted open a passage into Khyber, revealing the way to the Spinners Prison. Sabriz joined the other Lords of Dust cultists and monsters there as they attempted to gain access to the prison, but was slain by forces from the Church of the Silver Flame that arrived to stop the escape attempt.
